properties.name: spring.grpc.server.address
properties.description: The address to bind to in the form 'host:port' or a pseudo URL like 'static://host:port'. When the address is set it takes precedence over any configured host/port values.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable server autoconfiguration.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.exception-handling.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable user-defined global exception handling on the gRPC server.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.health.actuator.enabled
properties.description: Whether to adapt Actuator health indicators into gRPC health checks.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.health.actuator.health-indicator-paths
properties.description: List of Actuator health indicator paths to adapt into gRPC health checks.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.health.actuator.update-initial-delay
properties.description: The initial delay before updating the health status the very first time.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.health.actuator.update-overall-health
properties.description: Whether to update the overall gRPC server health (the '' service) with the aggregate status of the configured health indicators.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.health.actuator.update-rate
properties.description: How often to update the health status.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.health.enabled
properties.description: Whether to auto-configure Health feature on the gRPC server.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.host
properties.description: Server host to bind to. The default is any IP address ('*').

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.inprocess.exclusive
properties.description: Whether the inprocess server factory should be the only server factory available. When the value is true, no other server factory will be configured.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.inprocess.name
properties.description: The name of the in-process server or null to not start the in-process server.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.keep-alive.max-age
properties.description: Maximum time a connection may exist before being gracefully terminated (default infinite).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.keep-alive.max-age-grace
properties.description: Maximum time for graceful connection termination (default infinite).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.keep-alive.max-idle
properties.description: Maximum time a connection can remain idle before being gracefully terminated (default infinite).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.keep-alive.permit-time
properties.description: Maximum keep-alive time clients are permitted to configure (default 5m).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.keep-alive.permit-without-calls
properties.description: Whether clients are permitted to send keep alive pings when there are no outstanding RPCs on the connection (default false).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.keep-alive.time
properties.description: Duration without read activity before sending a keep alive ping (default 2h).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.keep-alive.timeout
properties.description: Maximum time to wait for read activity after sending a keep alive ping. If sender does not receive an acknowledgment within this time, it will close the connection (default 20s).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.max-inbound-message-size
properties.description: Maximum message size allowed to be received by the server (default 4MiB).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.max-inbound-metadata-size
properties.description: Maximum metadata size allowed to be received by the server (default 8KiB).

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.observation.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Observations on the server.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.port
properties.description: Server port to listen on. When the value is 0, a random available port is selected.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.reflection.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Reflection on the gRPC server.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.security.csrf.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable CSRF protection on gRPC requests.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.servlet.enabled
properties.description: Whether to use a servlet server in a servlet-based web application. When the value is false, a native gRPC server will be created as long as one is available, and it will listen on its own port. Should only be needed if the GrpcServlet is on the classpath

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.shutdown-grace-period
properties.description: Maximum time to wait for the server to gracefully shutdown. When the value is negative, the server waits forever. When the value is 0, the server will force shutdown immediately. The default is 30 seconds.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.ssl.bundle
properties.description: SSL bundle name. Should match a bundle configured in spring.ssl.bundle.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.ssl.client-auth
properties.description: Client authentication mode.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.ssl.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL support.

properties.name: spring.grpc.server.ssl.secure
properties.description: Flag to indicate that client authentication is secure (i.e. certificates are checked). Do not set this to false in production.
